query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notification_logs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  candidate_id INT NOT NULL,
  notification_type ENUM(
    'interview_questions_generated',
    'video_analysis_completed',
    'offer_generated',
    'interview_scheduled',
    'application_received',
    'status_update'
  ) NOT NULL,
  subject VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  body TEXT NOT NULL,
  recipient_email VARCHAR(320) NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('sent', 'failed', 'pending') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  failed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  error_message TEXT NULL,
  metadata TEXT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HwZw1vuDqLodBY.root --database hjcHA4SjAwhM6aP28vcAkH --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notification_logs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  candidate_id INT NOT NULL,
  notification_type ENUM(
    'interview_questions_generated',
    'video_analysis_completed',
    'offer_generated',
    'interview_scheduled',
    'application_received',
    'status_update'
  ) NOT NULL,
  subject VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  body TEXT NOT NULL,
  recipient_email VARCHAR(320) NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('sent', 'failed', 'pending') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  sent_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  failed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  error_message TEXT NULL,
  metadata TEXT NULL,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
